common.subscribe-msg: Subscribe to your favorite podcast platform:

header.title: I'll help you develop your management skills
header.description: Increase your productivity at work by reaching for accessible, practical and unique knowledge that will help you change the way you work every day.

quotes.description: My community is anyone who wants to increase their productivity and efficiency in their daily work. They reach for this hard-to-reach, practical and unique knowledge: creators, writers, programmers, marketers, agencies, software companies, communities, podcasters..

footer.legal-msg: The information posted on our website cannot be considered as advice on any matter. The content contained therein is for informational purposes only, and we do not accept any responsibility for any damages resulting from their interpretation without consultation. All materials provided on our website are current as of the date of posting. However, we cannot guarantee that they will be current or useful in every factual circumstance or at all times. Any content contained on our website may only be used for non-commercial private use. If you want to use them for public or commercial purposes, please contact us.
